cause.description:
This is important to us...the manatis are one of Puerto Rico's animals that are in danger of becoming extinct...they aren't bad animals...they are the complete opposite! They are the cutest animals and they're harmless. Please we would really like to help them out :) You my donate or just join out cause at least. Thank You
1. Keep our beaches clean.
2. Special needs are necessary.
cause.name: Manatis Extinction
